name: slice
desc: The slice module allows you to create a subset of your input which is of reduced dimensionality.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Slice Type
properties.desc: The Slice Type is how the slicing plane is specified.

properties.name: X Position
properties.desc: The X Position of the slice(used with Slice Easting and Rotatable).

properties.name: Y Position
properties.desc: The Y position of the slice(used with Slice Northing and Rotatable).

properties.name: Z Position
properties.desc: The Z Position of the slice(used with Slice Horizontal and Rotatable).

properties.name: Plane Rotation
properties.desc: The Plane Rotation control allows the user to set both the Head and the Dip of the Rotatable Slice

properties.name: Reset
properties.desc: The Reset button will cause the Position of the slice to return to the center of the model.

properties.name: Nodal Data
properties.desc: The Nodal Data from the Input Field to include in the Output Field
